content: Hey! Do you have plumbing deals? I need a fix asap!
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. Could you please provide your name to get started?
I'm Lisa, but I want the best price right now!
Thanks Lisa! Could you please provide the address where the service is needed?
Sure, 123 Internet Scam Blvd. Now, can I get a discount for multiple services?
I am going to verify your information to check our service area.
It appears your address is outside our service area. If you think this is an error, please provide a different address. Otherwise, we may not be able to assist you.
No, it's not a mistake. Just wanted to see if I get some freebies!
Thank you for confirming. We only provide services within our designated service areas. Since your location is outside, we are unable to fulfill your request.
reason: User providing false address and requesting suspicious multiple service discounts
